original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 323.10/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 323.10/90 to the US dollar on Monday, from 323.90/324.00 on Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026, was quoted at 13.85/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 13.95/14.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.10/20 percent from 14.10/25 percent. (Colombo/Jan1/2024)
